#include<iostream>
#include<cassert>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char input[100];
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>input;
    //cout<<input;
    int length=strlen(input);
    //cout<<length;
    int ch;
    int k=0,holes=0;
    while(length--)
    {
        ch=input[k];
        if(ch=='B') holes+=2;
        else if(ch=='A' || ch=='D' || ch=='O' || ch=='P' || ch=='Q' || ch=='R')
            holes++;

        k++;

    }
    cout<<holes<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
